overview.title: Overview
overview.description: View summarized post data (author, text, likes, comments, reposts).

lifestyle_trends.title: Lifestyle Trends
lifestyle_trends.description: View extracted Weibo posts for lifestyle-related topics such as 护肤, 健身, 旅行, 穿搭, 美食.

raw_data.title: Raw Dataset
raw_data.description: Access the complete raw dataset of all scraped Weibo posts.
